mapper.select: select count(user_id) from questionnaire where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into questionnaire(user_id, funds, saving, insurance, stocks, gold, bond, answer) values(#{userId}, #{funds}, #{saving}, #{insurance}, #{stocks}, #{gold}, #{bond}, #{answer})
update questionnaire set funds = #{funds}, saving = #{saving}, insurance = #{insurance}, stocks = #{stocks}, gold = #{gold}, bond = #{bond}, answer = #{answer}
